name: Moonweb
description: The Moonweb is a Medium aberration with a daunting appearance, characterized by its ability to evade attacks and move between planes, and is perfectly adapted to thrive in low-light environments.
memorable: It can regain health from its acid damage and has the ability to paralyze targets with its tendrils.
goals: To ambush and neutralize foes using stealth and mobility.
relations: Often encountered in areas infused with otherworldly energies or with creatures that inhabit different planes.
environment: Found in places of ethereal energy or locations that blur the lines between planes.
strengths: High dexterity allows for effective dodging; immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence limits complex strategies.
attacks: Dissolving Bite deals piercing and acid damage while healing the Moonweb, and Tendrils can paralyze foes.
most_powerful_ability: Etheric Pulse creates area control, partially ethereal targets can only deal magical damage to others.
senses: Blindsight up to 120 feet allows it to detect creatures regardless of visibility.
skills: Good perception aids its awareness of surroundings despite its low intelligence.
additional_information: Doesn’t require air or sleep due to Alien Nature.
Gains advantage on stealth checks while motionless or in dim light.
Can position itself strategically with Ethereal Jaunt.
Ability to deal both piercing and acid damage enhances its lethality.
Can pinpoint the location of partially ethereal creatures.
test_queries: stealthy flying monster in ethereal realm
monster that heals itself with attacks
